member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Uses MD5 hashing algorithm on input string.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the input string is predefined Boolean value.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 16-bit integer equivalent.
member.returns: 16-bit integer equivalent of the string or 0

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 32-bit integer equivalent.
member.returns: 32-bit integer equivalent of the string or 0

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 64-bit integer equivalent.
member.returns: 64-bit integer equivalent of the string or 0

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a dateTime to its DateTime equivalent if possible.
member.returns: DateTime version of the string or MinValue if the conversion fails.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize First Letter of given string.
member.returns: Returns the string with capital first letter or same string if empty.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds string between starting string and end string with given starting point.
member.returns: A substring between startString and endString. Empty string if none found.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all characters other than letters, numbers, "_", and ".".

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces sapces with dashes; Removes all characters other than Latin letters, "_", "." and "-".

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters of a string.
member.param: the count of characters to be retrieved.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension of a file.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the content type by file extension.

member.name: M:CodeDocumentation.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert all characters of a string in bytes.
